page.title: 12ATTITUDES IN PARR.
page.content: We went around the area to ask people what their attitudes were on different topics. We asked them :- 1."What do you think of the recent miners strike?". Out of 26 people 9 said it was a waste of time, nothing was gained, 5 agreed with it, the rest were undecided. 2."What do you think of housing provision in this area?". Out of 24 interviewed 12 said terrible, 7 said they weren't too bad, 5 people said they particularly disliked the three storey town houses. 3."What do you think of the local council?". 19 people expressed discontent while others said the council weren't bothered. 4."If you had the choice, would you move to another area?". 12 said yes they would, the rest said no.
